He is the cofounder of PediaMed.AI Lab. His research interests include AI for healthcare, AI for social good, autonomous driving, computer vision
Currently, he is pursuing a Ph.D. degree in the College of Engineering at Purdue University, specializing in applied AI/ML, autonomous driving, and digital twin
